title: Peanut and Tamarind Sauce
ingredients: ['250ml chicken stock', '130g crunchy peanut butter', '2 tablespoons tamarind paste or pulp', '1 small fresh red chilli, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon finely chopped fresh root ginger', '1 teaspoon finely chopped garlic', '1 tablespoon hoisin sauce', '1 tablespoon fish sauce', '4 teaspoons coconut cream concentrate', '2 teaspoons soy sauce']
